text: The iPad Pro line is updated before the iPhone with a hardware feature that's not on any current iPhone in 2019 or 2020
full-pick-text: The iPad Pro line is updated before the iPhone with a hardware feature that's not on any current iPhone in 2019 or 2020
notes: • Myke says during grading that he originally expected 5G to get him this point but LIDAR did instead, but he actually focused on LIDAR when originally explaining this pick. (During the grading, Federico delivers his impromptu review of the 2020 iPad Pro.)
